title: A Big TV Deal for Big Ten Football
itunes:title: A Big TV Deal for Big Ten Football
description:
Hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower talk over the massive new seven-year TV broadcast rights deal the Big Ten struck with Fox, CBS and NBC and what it means for the media landscape of college football.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
